welcome.title: Welcome to Psychora
welcome.description: An environment designed for stress-free support.
auth.signin.title: Welcome Back
auth.signin.description: Sign in to your Psychora account.
auth.signup.title: Create an Account
auth.signup.description: Enter your details to get started. All new accounts are created with Student privileges.
auth.form.name: Full Name
dashboard.title: Analytics Dashboard
dashboard.description: Anonymous insights into student mental health trends.
dashboard.moodTrends.title: Mood Trends Over Time
dashboard.stressors.title: Most Common Stressors
chat.ai.greeting: Hello! I'm your AI wellness assistant from Psychora. How are you feeling today? Feel free to share what's on your mind. I'm here to listen and offer support.
chat.alert.title: Important: Support is available
chat.alert.description:
It sounds like you are going through a lot right now. Based on our conversation, we strongly recommend connecting with a professional who can provide dedicated support.

Would you like to be securely connected with an on-campus counselor?
chat.error: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.
booking.title: Book an Appointment
booking.description: Schedule a confidential session with one of our on-campus counselors.
booking.dialog.title: Book a session with {{counselorName}}
booking.dialog.description: Select a date and time for your confidential session.
booking.toast.success.title: Appointment Booked!
booking.toast.success.description: Your session with {{counselorName}} is confirmed for {{date}} at {{time}}.
booking.toast.fail.title: Booking Failed
booking.toast.fail.description: Please select a date and time.
resources.title: Resource Library
resources.description: Explore our curated collection of videos, audio, and guides for mental wellness.
peerSupport.title: Peer Support Forum
peerSupport.description: Connect with fellow students in a safe and moderated environment.
peerSupport.card.title: Welcome to the Community
peerSupport.card.description: This is a space to share experiences, ask for advice, and support one another. All discussions are moderated by trained student volunteers to ensure a positive and helpful atmosphere.
sidebar.user.name: Student User
access.denied.title: Access Denied
access.denied.description: You do not have permission to view this page.
features.heading: How We Can Help
features.ai.title: AI Support Chat
features.ai.description: Get immediate, friendly advice from our AI chatbot. It's here to listen 24/7.
features.booking.title: Book a Counselor
features.booking.description: Schedule a confidential appointment with a professional campus counselor.
features.resources.title: Resource Hub
features.resources.description: Explore articles, videos, and audio guides on mental health topics.
features.peerSupport.title: Peer Support Forum
features.peerSupport.description: Moderated peer-to-peer support forum with trained student volunteers.
pathways.title: Personalized Wellness Pathways
pathways.description: Start a guided 7-day journey to build healthy habits and improve your well-being.
pathways.ai.title: A Suggestion For You
pathways.ai.description: Based on recent activity patterns, we think this pathway might be helpful. Your activity data is always kept anonymous.
pathways.ai.showAll: Not interested? See all pathways instead.
pathways.examStress.title: Exam Stress Pathway
pathways.examStress.description: A 7-day plan to manage anxiety and stay focused during exam season.
pathways.examStress.tasks.day1: Watch a 5-minute video on effective study break techniques.
pathways.examStress.tasks.day2: Listen to a 10-minute guided meditation for focus.
pathways.examStress.tasks.day3: Read a guide on creating a balanced study schedule.
pathways.examStress.tasks.day4: Try a 5-minute breathing exercise for quick calm.
pathways.examStress.tasks.day5: Listen to calming nature sounds while you study.
pathways.examStress.tasks.day6: Watch a short yoga video for releasing neck and shoulder tension.
pathways.examStress.tasks.day7: Read an article on overcoming last-minute exam nerves.
pathways.mindfulness.title: Mindfulness Basics Pathway
pathways.mindfulness.description: Learn the fundamentals of mindfulness with this 7-day introductory course.
pathways.mindfulness.tasks.day1: Watch a video explaining 'What is Mindfulness?'.
pathways.mindfulness.tasks.day3: Read a guide on mindful observation.
pathways.mindfulness.tasks.day4: Listen to a 10-minute body scan meditation audio.
pathways.mindfulness.tasks.day5: Practice mindful listening with our audio guide.
pathways.mindfulness.tasks.day6: Read about incorporating mindfulness into daily routines.
pathways.mindfulness.tasks.day7: Watch a video on cultivating a mindful attitude.
pathways.progress.title: Your Current Pathway
pathways.progress.subtitle: Consistency is key. Complete one small task each day.
wellnessCheckin.title: Wellness Check-in
wellnessCheckin.description: A confidential questionnaire to help you reflect on your well-being.
Over the last 2 weeks, how often have yo: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems?
Little interest or pleasure in doing thi: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sl: Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
Feeling tired or having little energy: Feeling tired or having little energy
Feeling bad about yourself — or that you: Feeling bad about yourself — or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
Trouble concentrating on things, such as: Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
Moving or speaking so slowly that other: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite — being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
Thoughts that you would be better off de: Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way
Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge: Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge
Not being able to stop or control worryi: Not being able to stop or control worrying
Worrying too much about different things: Worrying too much about different things
Being so restless that it is hard to sit: Being so restless that it is hard to sit still
Feeling afraid as if something awful mig: Feeling afraid as if something awful might happen
wellnessCheckin.results.title: Your Check-in Results
wellnessCheckin.results.description: Here is a summary of your responses from {{date}}. This is a private snapshot for your reflection.
wellnessCheckin.results.aiError: Could not generate AI interpretation at this time. Please check your scores and the recommendations below.
wellnessCheckin.results.disclaimer: These results are for informational purposes only and are not a substitute for professional medical advice. A low score does not rule out a problem, and a high score is not a formal diagnosis.
wellnessCheckin.card.unlockedTitle: Your Bi-Weekly Wellness Check-in is Ready
wellnessCheckin.card.description: Take a few minutes for a confidential self-assessment. It’s a simple way to reflect on your well-being.
wellnessCheckin.card.lockedDescription: You've completed your check-in. Your next one will be available in:
upcomingAppointment.title: Upcoming Appointment
upcomingAppointment.description: Your confirmed session details are below.
progress.title: My Progress
progress.description: A private overview of your wellness journey over time.
progress.trends.title: Wellness Score Trends
progress.trends.description: Visualize your PHQ-9 (Depression) and GAD-7 (Anxiety) scores from your check-ins.
progress.pathways.title: Completed Pathways
progress.pathways.description: Review the wellness pathways you have successfully completed.
progress.sessions.title: Session History
progress.sessions.description: A log of your past appointments with counselors.
games.hub.title: Mindful Games
games.hub.description: Engage in calming activities to build your mindfulness streaks.
games.hub.streak.title: Daily Streak
games.zenFlow.title: Zen Flow
games.zenFlow.description: Connect matching orbs to fill the grid and clear your mind.
games.zenFlow.instructions: On the grid below, connect the matching colored orbs with a continuous line. The lines cannot cross, and the entire grid must be filled. Take your time and find your flow.
games.zenFlow.completion.first.title: The path is clear.
games.zenFlow.completion.first.descripti: You've brought order and calm to your mind. You've also started your streak for this game! Feel free to return anytime you need a moment of peace.
games.zenFlow.completion.subsequent.desc: You've taken another moment to find your focus. Every path you clear strengthens your mindfulness.
games.breatheBloom.title: Breathe & Bloom
games.breatheBloom.description: Follow the lotus to find a calming breath rhythm.
games.breatheBloom.instructions: Let's find our rhythm with Breathe & Bloom. Follow the lotus flower's pace. Inhale as it blooms, and exhale as it closes. Complete 5 cycles to find your center.
games.breatheBloom.completion.first.desc: You've centered your breath and started your streak for this game! Return here whenever you need to reconnect with your rhythm.
games.breatheBloom.completion.subsequent: You've completed another cycle of mindful breathing. Carry this sense of peace with you throughout your day.
games.gratitudeStone.title: Gratitude Stone
games.gratitudeStone.description: Acknowledge a positive moment to build a foundation of gratitude.
games.gratitudeStone.instructions: Welcome to your Gratitude Stone. Today's prompt is: 'What is one small thing that brought you joy today?' Type a word or two that captures this feeling to create your stone.
games.gratitudeStone.prompt.title: Today's Gratitude
games.gratitudeStone.prompt.description: What is one small thing that brought you joy today?
games.gratitudeStone.prompt.placeholder: A warm cup of tea, a sunny moment...
games.gratitudeStone.completion.first.de: Acknowledging the good is a powerful practice. You've started your streak for this game! Your collection of positive moments is growing.
games.gratitudeStone.completion.subseque: Each stone you create builds a foundation of positivity. Thank you for taking this time for reflection.
streaks.sprout.title: You've earned the Sprout badge!
streaks.sprout.description: Congratulations! You've played a Mindful Game for 2 days in a row. Keep this healthy habit growing.
streaks.seedling.title: You are now a Seedling!
streaks.seedling.description: Amazing! A 8-day streak! Your dedication is showing. Keep nurturing your mind.
streaks.flourisher.title: You are a true Flourisher!
streaks.flourisher.description: Incredible! A 16-day streak! You've unlocked exclusive articles on focus and mindfulness.
streaks.sunChaser.title: You have become a Sun Chaser!
streaks.sunChaser.description: Wow, 31 days of mindfulness! You are always turning towards the light. Your journey is inspiring!
streaks.zenith.title: You have reached a Zenith of mindfulness!
streaks.zenith.description: 61 consecutive days. This is a monumental achievement in self-care.
streaks.groveKeeper.title: You are now a Grove Keeper!
streaks.groveKeeper.description: 101 days! You are cultivating an entire forest of well-being within yourself.
streaks.mindfulMaster.title: You are a Mindful Master!
streaks.mindfulMaster.description: 201 days. A huge milestone in your commitment. Your dedication is the ultimate reward.
streaks.celestial.title: You've achieved Celestial status!
streaks.celestial.description: 366 days is truly out of this world. Your mind is your universe.
user.management.title: Manage User Roles
user.management.description: Assign or change roles for users in the system. Only Super Admins can perform this action.
user.management.searchPlaceholder: Search by user name or email...
user.management.toast.roleUpdated.title: Role Updated
user.management.toast.roleUpdated.descri: Role for {{email}} has been changed to {{role}}.
user.management.toast.adminLimit.title: Admin limit reached
user.management.toast.adminLimit.descrip: Only one Admin is allowed per institution.
user.management.toast.moderatorLimit.des: A maximum of two Moderators are allowed.
user.management.noUsersFound: No users found matching your search.
peer.support.noPosts: No posts yet. Be the first to share!

peer.support.report.toast.description: Thank you for helping keep the community safe. A moderator will review this post.
peer.support.delete.toast.title: Post Deleted
peer.support.delete.toast.description: The post has been removed from the forum.
peer.support.report.label: Report post
peer.support.delete.label: Delete post
top.nav.logout.toast.title: Logged Out
top.nav.logout.toast.description: You have been successfully logged out.
top.nav.role.switch.toast.title: Role Switched
top.nav.role.switch.toast.description: You are now logged in as {{role}}.
top.nav.role.switch.label: Switch Role (Demo)
upcoming.appointment.reschedule.toast.ti: Reschedule is not available in this demo.
upcoming.appointment.reschedule.toast.de: In a real app, this would open the booking calendar.
upcoming.appointment.join.toast.title: Session link is not yet active.
upcoming.appointment.join.toast.descript: The "Join Session" button will be enabled 10 minutes before your scheduled time.
zen.flow.title: Zen Flow
zen.flow.description: Fill the grid to find your flow.
